mapper.insert: insert into address_info (address_id, address_type, address_lon, address_lat, address_name, address_code, address_desc, is_del, create_time, update_time) values (#{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addressType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressLon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update address_info set address_type = #{addressType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_lon = #{addressLon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, address_lat = #{addressLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, address_name = #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_code = #{addressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_desc = #{addressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where address_id = #{addressId}
mapper.select: select address_id, address_type, address_lon, address_lat, address_name, address_code, address_desc, is_del, create_time, update_time from address_info where address_id = #{addressId}
select address_id, address_type, address_lon, address_lat, address_name, address_code, address_desc, is_del, create_time, update_time from address_info
